content.detailedDescription: I went out front. looked up into the sky. there was an airplane/jet flying east. then a white light came up along side of it fast, it slowed beside the plane, the light then sped east,at a speed i have never seen, made a half circle southward then changed direction to the north. this thing was super fast, unrealistic to me, to fly that fast and change direction so fast.   then the ufo took off north all at a speed i cannot describe. then there was a second plane not far behind the first.
content.summary: Two planes in sky white light approaches then sped off

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was watching tv and the outside and inside dogs started barking as if someone had pulled into the driveway. i looked outside and no one was there. they continued to go crazy so i looked outside my living room window and see what i thought might be a helicopter.I went out on the front porch and watch this object move slowly across the sky. i tell my son to come outside and see the lights because it is different than anything i have seen before.The lights seem steady with no blinking and it moved around slowly, then it disappears in mid air. there was never a sound and the dogs were barking and looking up at the object.I did not have any reaction to this event. i see helicopters and airplanes a lot and this was not any of them.I did't get to take a picture or video but this is not the first time i have seen strange objects in the air.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 to 4 lights moving slowly, slightly changing directions, then disappeared in mid air.

content.detailedDescription:
I walk my dogs every night before retiring and had one dog tied on her chain while i walked the oldest to the end of our drive way and looked   down the road west toward town.The time was about 9:20 pm cst.
my wife and i have seen the space station go over at times and this time when i looked towards town i saw a bright orange roundish shape coming our way and i thought hmmm i wonder if this could be the space station .There was some cloudiness and not fog but hazy sort of but which you could see stars betwwen smaller clouds.
the orange object kept coming in my direction  and i also wondered perhaps maybe the only jet we have here was coming into the local air port.About this instant from the same direction but more over the top of me came a secound orange object over a large willow tree in the yard i would guess maybe 1/4 mile or more abreast of the 1st object but trailing it similar to what i would call a wing man.
i was watching them both when the 1st one turned and started flying to the south almost a straight line away from me and was still glowing bright orange.
the secound one flew almost directly over my head and again i thought maybe they were fighter planes from madison flying a night mission. 
the 1st object was getting dimmer as it got further away from me and then the 2nd one turned what i would say was south east and continued on that course til it also disappeared from view .While the 2nd one was right over head 2 cars went by toward town and i wondered if they were watching this object also but they did not stop but continued down the road.
what really gets me is that there was no sound at all from either object,the  color was the same both coming and going away and when the fighters do fly here you can hear them for a very long time.These objects made no sound at all !
i dont have a camera cell phone and dont know what one would have captured if i did have one but this incident has got me.I was in the air force as a photo interpreter in the 1960's and saw lots of things but this one has me stumped and at the same time shaking.
i called the local sheriffs office and told them what i had seen and they hadnt had any other calls .
any one wants to come and chat - i will have you stand where i did and will show you where the objects came from and went to..Good luck on this one..Thank you.
content.summary: Saw 1st light come from west then 2nd appeared approx 1/4 mile beside 1st- 1st one turned south then 2nd    turned to  south east  til out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my daughter home from an event around 10:30 this evening (september 2, 2011). very close to my house, we suddenly saw an orange-red orb hovering fairly high in the sky. we stopped at the nearest stop sign to watch it. it moved around in a general, clear path, but it made small oscillating motions. my daughter saw a thin, fuzzy black line going through the circular, red-orange center; i did not see this. we attempted to take a video on my daughter's cell phone but the light was so far away that it did not show up on the viewfiender. the object continued to move further away until it disappeared (disintigrated) into the clear night sky. there were no sounds heard. it was definitely not a plane nor a helicopter. we drove around for a while searching for it, but it was simply gone.
content.summary: Saw red orange round light moving high in sky and then disappeared into clear night sky

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 0205 jan. 2, 1969 my hunting partner and i had finished a predator hunt for turkey farmers that had been suffering losses.  since we had guns we had nothing but coffee to drink the whole night. (so we weren't drunk!) as we drove along an isolated country road, heading home, what appeared to be an aircraft that was on fire came over a hill heading toward us.  it was trailing a long conical tail of what looked like fire and was on what appeared to be a collision course with us.  i slammed on the brakes and pulled to the side of the road but failed to turn out my lights.
the craft continued to approach us until it was about 300 meters away then stopped and hovered.  the conical tail seemed to catch-up to it and went out.  my partner and i exited the vehicle (my truck) and looked closely at the object.
the object was an exact example of one of the old 1950s/60s flying saucers. or almost like your picture above except that there were two domes-one on top and one on the bottom.  thesaucers were separated by a row of verticalrectangular lights that pulsed in a sequencial manner around the perimeter of the vessel.
even though we could see this craft clearly with our naked eyes, we looked at it through the scopes of our rifles.  the object was too large and close for a view of the whole craft through the scopes.  as we put our rifles down we watched it silently rotate 90 degrees and shoot straight up until it was smaller than a star and winked out.
my partner would have no part of reporting this sighting but i tried to report it to vandenberg afb only to be told they had no ufo section.
we didn't see any little green men nor did we see markings of the federation of mars on the vessel.  it could have been made in somebody's garage for all i know.  
thus it happened, truth be told.  hoc
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Flaming object came over hill with conical tail appeared to aim at us then stopped and hovered

content.detailedDescription: Hovered over houses across from my house, first there were 2 floating by, and continued on, there were a few more, i ran got my digital camera, shut the flash and started taking shots of the craft through my 2nd floor window, on came out like a triangle shape, three rods with pods at the ends of like a tri-pod, it did not spin, they floated along, bright like on fire, and floated into the distance...I have a few good pictures but not interested in losing my copy right to them by sending them along.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered over houses across from my house, first there were 2 floating by, and continued on, there were a few more, i ran got my digital camera, shut the flash and started taking shots of the craft through my 2nd floor window, on came out like a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was drivin home around 12, when i looked into the sky and saw a light and i didnt think anything of it i thought it was a plane untill i really looked and it wasnt movin just huvering there. it had random blinking white lights in a oval shape and a red one in the middle, that blinked. then behind the main one, there was two small triangles of white lights behind the main oval. then inbetween the pair of tringles a little behind is two red lights close together..It didnt move or anything i saw it four about 10min before it sunk in what it was so i drove home scared..Lol. by the time i drove up the street to my house i couldnt see it any longer.
content.summary: It scared me really badly.. i thought when i did see one i wouldnt be scared.

content.detailedDescription: I was curious if my camera could take pictures of those blinking stars that i always see. so i zoomed in and i took 76 pictures of it. then my plan was to put them on the computer and zoom in on them and see what i could see. and just this one picture came out like this. you might have to zoom in your self and get a better look. so what do you think this is?
content.summary: Zoomed in on star blinking colors w/canon power shot sx30 is camera

content.detailedDescription: I was curious if my camera could take pictures of those blinking stars that i always see. so i zoomed in and i took 76 pictures of it. then my plan was to put them on the computer and zoom in on them and see what i could see. and just this one picture came out like this. you might have to zoom in your self and get a better look. so what do you think this is?
content.summary: Zoomed in on star blinking colors w/canon power shot sx30 is camera

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my daughters home when she started yelling for me to come outside. "mom", she said. "i dont know what it is, i just dont know, hurry." as i got outside, i couldnt believe my eyes,there was these three bright lights and none of them were moving they also werent that far from us. she kept asking what is it? i said in disbelief, "it must be a ufo." i ran to get my husband who was asleep in the chair. i yelled at him to get up and come see this, we dont know what it is. while i was getting my husband, the ufo held still and never moved. then once we got outside, one light went out and then the other light went out too. it almost looked as if it seperated, but then it started to move right in front of us when all the sudden the third light went out and we saw something like maybe vapor fall out from underneath. but when the lights left there was no noise or anything.  we took a picture of the lights and what we think is the ufo. it shows four lights but we never saw more then three lights with our own eyes. the shape was in a saucer, as in one of the old toy tops that you spin. there was also two beams of light coming from underneath the ufo. i was astonished seeing this with my own eyes.
content.summary: still in disbelief it was shocking

content.detailedDescription: I live about 15 miles from the airport, so i am very used to seeing planes and helicopters. their flashing lights seem to give them away. however, i was sitting on the porch with my boyfriend when i looked up and saw a light so round and bright, i had to ask him if he saw in which he replied yes. i then asked if he saw any flashing lights. like me, he saw none, so we continued to watch this object. the skies are heavy with airtraffic tonight so it was very easy to see that this was something out of the ordinary. the light was extremely bright white in nature and it seemed to be gliding across the sky very slowly. the intensity and speed of this light favored a meteor, however it wasn't descending and it had no trail of any type. as i continued to watch, it stayed very bright as it moved farther away and within a blink of an eye it literally disappeared. no gradual fade of light, nothing. it just vanished. i have never seen a ufo or anything i couldn't explain but this something that has truly frightened me. if you need anything more from me, please do not hesitate to contact me.
content.summary: Bright white ball of light that disappeared..

content.detailedDescription:
This report is filed by steve murillo, state section director for mufon los angeles. this report is a follow on to report number 30017, in which witness a reported seeing a black "hockey puck" like object ambling slowly through the sky near her location in studio city, ca at approx 8:45 pm on the 4th of july, 2011. witness a did not take any photos or video of the object.

after her sighting, witness a performed a search on the internet and found a video on youtube, filed by witness b. witness a identified the object in the video as what she saw. witness b was eventually located and interviewed. this report is a result of that interview. 

witness b and her family were celebrating the 4th of july in front of their house in chino hills, ca. chino hills is approximately 40 miles sw of studio city and witness a. the adult witnesses present were she, her husband, her sister, her brother-in-law, and her sister-in-law. 

at around sunset, the family was lighting fireworks and enjoying the evening, when a strange black object with pulsing lights was suddenly spotted. witness b already had her camera in hand, and began to film the object. the witness stated that she only filmed the object for about a minute, due to the fact that she had her hands full with a baby in arms, and was simultaneously supervising the other children who were playing with fireworks. she stated that even though she only filmed it for a minute or so, the sighting actually lasted for a good 15 minutes or longer. she called her sister out of the house (also holding a baby) and her husband was helping the kids light fireworks, so he also immediately observed the object. in total, there were eventually five adult witnesses to the object. witness b stated that the neighbors two houses down also seemed to notice the object.

i asked why she and her family seemed to have a casual attitude while viewing the object. she stated that at first she did not know what to think-she is not given to "believing in aliens", nor is her family, and at first thought that it might a remote controlled toy. she stated that after watching it for a while, she decided it could not be an rc craft, because it was too large. i asked her how large it appeared to be, and she stated "about the size of a small helicopter". the witness stated that the object moved through the sky in an ascending straight line, se to nw. they watched the object until it disappeared as a small black dot, lost in the clouds.
content.summary: Dark uav with red flashing lights on the 4th of july

content.detailedDescription: Eight miles north of powell, wy.  driving in my pickup on a narrow, paved,steep road enroute to the powell airport so i could fly my airplane to greybull, wy, for dynamic propeller balancing. time 0730 mdt; date 13 july 2000; ceiling and visibility unlimited; wind calm; crystal clear with no smoke or haze. sighted a perfect ellipticlly shaped object to the north, (azimuth approx 350) elevation angle approx 30 deg. major axis parallel to a horizon. length of object subtended 1 and 3/4 inches at a "short" arm's length. length along the major axis about three times that along the minor axis. object appeared stationary. i did not stop as no real shoulders and a steep dropoff to the left (south), although i would have stopped were i to have had a camera.  color of object kind of a flat silvery, grayish white, somewhat similar to the light areas of a daytime moon; no color gradations; no markings; no lines; no shadows.  i don't know if it were a small object nearby or a large object far away. would lean towards the latter.  i couldn't tell if it were a true ellipse in shape or a circular object at a tilt.  object was in sight for approx 35-40 seconds.  rising ground between me and the object as i neared the end of the climb caused loss of sighting.  when clear after a few seconds, the object was not in sight. description of the sighting was related to my wife. about 5 other pilot friends and to the airport's fbo.  coodinates of sighting (obtained from a standard aeronautical sectional chart).  lat 44-52 n;  108-46 w. (deg and min).  my initial thought was of a blimp; however, this was discarded after 1/100 sec  as there were no tail feathers, no gondola, no engines. no color variations. no markings.  i have no idea what this thing was, but it was like nothing i've ever seen, before or after, including many years as an active pilot.
content.summary: Perfect ellipse, az 350, elev 30 stationary, 8 mi. north of powell, wy, 35 sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch with a friend when we both witnessed a bright extremely brilliant light in the sky moving at the same pace as a commercial airliner.  this light did not blink or flicker like a star and moved too slow to be a meteor or falling object from orbit.  it continued on a steady flight path across our field of vision in the night sky and its path was actually crossed by an unmistakable commercial airliner which we used to judge objects size and speed with.  the light appeared to be bigger than the plane and moving at a similar speed as the plane.  shortly after the plane crossed behind object, the light slowed to a halt and dimmed away as if it was on a dimmer switch
content.summary: Strange moving light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Hav e you  heard of this ufo?? please email me about it.  it is in our sky every clear night.
content.summary: Late night, every night the brightest

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog in my backyard i looked up and saw this object.  i stood still and watched the object, wishing i had my camera.  i knew the object was something out of the ordinary.  i then ran in and got my camera.  when i returned the object had not moved.  i took one picture.  i ran back inside to make sure i had a picture of the object.  yes, i had a good picture.  then i ran back outside take more pictures and object was gone.

when i saw the object i was facing south southeast and the sun was behind my right shoulder.

what do you think the object i saw may have been?



personal information:
i have a commercial pilot certificate and i have worked in engineering, some of the projects were for nasa.
content.summary: I saw a silver matlic object hovering at a very high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: It all started on fall night i was getting ready to go to sleep at about an hour until midnight in my room, as i was laying in bed i decided to open my window curtains just a bit to look at the night sky and mountain view, then i saw these three lights immediately hoovering over the mountains in a triangular shape they were all stationary in the sky but individually rotating position very quickly, stoped for two seconds then abruptly shot or speed off at a very high speed. from the begining i knew it had to be a ufo i was amazed to be seeing it when i did, after wards i was very excited .
content.summary: Three lights hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the pa turnpike, south, on my way to work.  it was approx 6:30 am on july 3rd, 2010.  i was aprrox 5 miles from the allentown exit when i took note of the morning clouds and the vibrant colors they were displaying.  the clouds were low lying and as i was enjoying the colors, i noted a flash of light from within the cloud.  the flash was pure white, illuminating the cloud from within.  it consisted of two lights, parallel to each other, length approx 100 yards.  the pattern followed a daimond pattern, moving in a counter clockwise motion.  the size would be approx 800 yards or larger.  i thought perhaps something was reflecting on my window, so i rolled down my window.  the lights were still there.  i then thought perhaps something was reflecting off the clouds while i was driving. i pulled over to observe the lights while stationary.  i noted no light source from the ground.  the lights were still there although i had traveled a mile or so down the road.  as i was watching, two small, pure white circular lights took off from the main source of light headed south.  they rate of speed was astounding.  they traveled approx 2-3 miles in seconds.  one turned left towards nj, the other south, towards philadelphia.  they moved so fast they were out of sight in seconds.  it was then i got an uneasy feeling about what i was seeing.  i always thought if given the chance i would want to see unknown things up close, but not that day.  i continued to work, and could see the lights for a few more miles.  when i got to work, i told my coworkers.  not much to my surprise, i got laughed at.  but, the next time i saw one of my coworkers who resides in bethlehem, pa., he told me he thought i was nuts.  but he saw it on the news that night.  made me feel a little better.  i would submit to a polygraph without hesitation.  thank you for allowing me to report this.  anyone else who has seen it, feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Lights near bethlehem, pa.  massive in size.

content.detailedDescription: object was diamond shaped and came straight down and then hovered over the houses then moved over to the middle of the street were it hovered for approx 20sec before going straight up. i was sitting on my neighbors steps and all of us and other neighbors saw it we all kind of just froze! i was a kid then and just recently remembered it. i asked some others who were there when we saw it and none remember. some of my childhood friends however do recall seeing a object that i described later on in life.
content.summary: Summer time in urban neighborhood, saw a diamond shaped object over homes and power lines

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the north side of tenerife, spain facing west at 2130 local time on july 31, 2011 when i noticed a light that at first appeared to be an aircraft rapidly descending. after looking closer i noticed a flashing red light, a blue flame that appeared to be the color of a blue flame from a welding torch and a white light all from one vehicle.

i am a former major airline pilot and estimate the postion of the event at:

latitude: 28.57���������n, 28���������34'0"n. longitude: 17.83���������w, 17���������50'0"w approx 15-20 degrees above the horizon.

i can also tell you that the speed at which the object moved indicated to me that it had to be moving at over 1200-2000 nm pr hr with changes in direction of at least 90 degrees in seconds. in my 21 plus years of flying all over the world in jets as a pilot i have never seen anything like this.

i never did lose sight of the object and just got tired of watching it with another witness. the tow of us compared observations and we are in full agreement as to what we saw.

i am 100% positive of what i saw and of the above description. i ahve never reported anything before and have never seen anything like this in my entire professional flying career as a major airlien pilot in the usa

i now live outside the usa and can be reached at teh email address below.

this is not some crackpot submission.

i can be reached at the email referenced within this report

please include the following in the subject line of any email you send me:

ufo sighting tenerife
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Eratic and rapid flight movement

content.detailedDescription: It was sometime in the afternoon, i was driving down the freeway from boardman, or to portland.  i was in the opposite lane.  the craft was landed in a ravine alongside the freeway, outside of the dalles, or.  there was a state police car there and 2-3 passenger cars parked behind it, on the side of the freeway, pulled over watching it.  i was on my way to the airport so i couldn't turn around and go back to pull over to view it better.  i didn't want to miss my plane.  i have never forgotten it and always wonder if the cop made some kind of report, or if anyone else reported it.  it was so long ago now that i don't remember the exact date.  i do know my daughter had just been born (aug. 28, 1978) and she was with me in the car as an infant, newborn actually, so it had to be sept. or oct. of 1978.  that's all i have.  i'm really hoping someone else reported seeing it because there were people pulled over and the cop there too, plus everyone like me who passed by but didn't stop.  it was in the eastbound lanes and i was traveling west, somewhere maybe around mile post 93?  that's a total guess because it happened so long ago.  i saw it because it was large and had lights on it.  i also noticed the state police car along side it.  it totally looked like a ufo.  it wasn't doing anything that i could see, i drove by pretty fast.  i was just sitting, parked at the bottom of a "draw" or ravine.  as near as i can remember it was cigar shaped with red (i think) lights around it.  i was so amazed that i had actually seen a ufo!!  i wanted to go back but thought "with a state policeman there surely there will be something in the paper!"  i really thought there would be a giant uproar about it.  but i was on my way to texas and people were expecting me to be on that plane so i had to keep going.  we didn't have cell phones and things like we do now so there was no way to get ahold of my people to let them know i'd be late.  i was gone for 1-2 weeks and when i got back i never did hear anything.  i lost sight of it as i continued down the freeway, until i couldn't see it in my mirror any more.
content.summary: I saw an ufo parked (landed) along side the freeway, several cars were parked watching it.

content.detailedDescription: I have only told this story to my immediate family and closest friend. i want to tell it now because i am at the autumn of my life and it needs to be told for my own peace of mind. it was 1972 and i had to go to the store for milk, i had three small children. we lived out in the country and the convenience store was about 5 miles away. there was a burn ban in the area due to very dry conditions. it was dark, and as i was traveling along the road to the store which was elevated from the large field below by approximately 8' on a large slope. there were no other cars on the road at the time. as i drove along the road, in the distance to my left approximately 50-100 feet, i noticed a glowing, burning area that i could not make out clearly from the road as i was on the opposite side and going about 35 mph. it resembled exactly what a lit cigarette looks like in the dark when someone inhales. it was that kind of a glow, like embers, but very bright and pulsating in the moonlight and the size of a small bon fire but yet not on fire. i remember saying to myself, " those darn teenagers around here, they're out in the field starting a bonfire and there's a burning ban on. when i come back from the store, i'm going to knock on the door of the house (which was on the opposite side of the road from the field) and let them know what's going on in their field." this was of course before cell phones. when i came back from the store, i had to pull over pretty far onto the opposite embankment facing the wrong way to see where the glowing was as it could no longer be seen from the other side of the road.  as i slid over to the passenger side of my car (my window was already opened), there it was. i was at once terrified and transfixed at what i saw, and my heart began to pound wildly. there below me in the distance, approximately 50-100 yards, was a disk about 8-10' across. it was off the ground about 5-6', perhaps hovering, but i saw no visible means of support or heard any noise or witnessed any movement.The entire top of the saucer was invisible, or not there, as if whatever forces were at hand, had put the top down like a car window, and out of sight. i could see clearly down into the craft which was silver in color on the outside. there were instrument panels about 10" deep (with small squares and grids) encircling the entire inside approximately 3' off the floor of the craft. all the panels were tilted downward at an angle, there was nothing else inside. the diameter or floor space only appeared to be 4 or 5' within the interior. the colors were iridescent, pulsating and neon like, with reds, blues, yellows, and white, like no colors i have ever seen before or again. all this took place within a few minutes because the terror i felt was overtaking me. upon the realization that there wasn't any entity in the craft and they (i thought at the time) would have seen me. i sped away wondering the whole time if anything was in my car or behind me. my imagination was running wild about what might happen to me. upon arriving home, i raced in to tell my husband so he would go back with me, but he told me to lock the doors and refused to go back with me. i wanted to call the state police, but he said no one would believe me and i would be ridiculed, so i didn't. we went back the next day and there was no visible trace of the incident on the ground. i made a sketch of the craft, but over the years, cannot find it. my friend has since married a state trooper who worked in that county and we talked about it a few years ago. he remembered there were several reports of sightings of a ufo in the area during that time.  i am now a grandmother and great grandmother, but this mystery will always be my most amazing and frightening experience.
content.summary: I witnessed a ufo hovering above the ground in a field 1972 and could see inside

content.detailedDescription: My wife was returning from philadelphia, pa. on june 21, 2011 when she saw the flight controls on the wing of the plane she was start moving. she thought it would make an interesting picture so she started photographing the wing with her digital camera. when she looked at the pictures later, she noticed an unexpected vortex in one of the pictures. i have seen similar picturesd from various sources. i would expect to see a vortex on the trailing edge of the wing or near the tip of the wing, but i have never heard of one forming on the leading edge and oreinting itself perpendicular to the wing. it appears to be at some distance from the wing and there are no apparent objects or air craft to have made it.
content.summary: Unexplained vortex

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving just getting onto the highway after 2am and i saw a white light shoot straight up into the air on an angle at a extremely high speed it didnt seem to go very far then it dissappeared. the light was steady and bright. the upward angle was to the right from my field of view. this happened heading home from white plain, ny on the ramp gettng onto 287 or whatever the main highway was. i was in disbelief and told the person that i was on the phone with what i just saw and asked them what it could be. they told me i just saw a ufo. i thought i had, but couldnt believe it.

please someone disprove me and tell me what else this could have been. i dont see how it could have been a sattellite, airplane, commet, or shoot star... it was moving too fast to be any kind or airplane and then just dissappeared after only being visible for a second or 2.
content.summary: White light shot up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife was flying from jacksonville,fl. to philadelphia,pa. the fight leftfl. shortly after sunrise on the 17th of june, she noticed the moon was visible and started taking pictures. while she was looking out the window of the plane she noticed a bright, shiney, object to the right and below the moon. she took several pictures of this object before it streaked out of sight. she said it moved so fasdt she did not really see it as a flight path. it simply streaked out of view. take a look at the pictures.
content.summary: Unknown object

content.detailedDescription: While flying from pennsylvania to florida last june, my wife took some photos of the wing of the plane. in one of the pictures there is an unexpected vortex that appears to be ahead of the wings leading edge and at some distance from the plane. the vortex appears to be heading into the distance at a ninty degree angle to the direction of the planes travel. this siting took place at some altitude and around three thirty in the afternoon. as is apparent in the photo the skies were clear (no clouds) and there doesn't seem to be any other craft in the area. she said she did not see the vortex herself until looking at the pictures later. the picture was taken with a cannon, powershot a720is digital camera, 8.0 megapixel w/6x optical zoom. it is puzzling because i would expect to see a vortex behind the wind in the slip stream, espeasially at the wing tip.
content.summary: Unkown vortex

content.detailedDescription: Working at joliet army ammunition plant back in july of 2003 i was having my truck de-conned to leave our work area. on the horizon coming toward me i noticed a silver object that resembled a party balloon(octagon) in shape but was spinning very quickly and was much larger. the sun reflecting off of the edges of the craft gave it an appearence of pulsating. my first thought was that it was a helicopter. it remained on an eastward path toward me and suddenly made an abrupt turn to the north and started to ascend rapidly. as it climbed up above what clouds were there, i noticed two other formations of crafts. they were in a diamond formation, with 6 in one formation which was 4 in a diamond and two that looked like they were forming a second diamond attached, and 3 in the second. the one craft that had been flying near the ground then filled in the second diamond shape. my co-worker and i both watched in silence, and no one else on the site ever mentioned it. we did not share the experience in fear of ridicule. i would have estimated the speed of the low flyng craft at around 150 mph and the height was anywhere from 150 to 350 feet and then it accelerated quickly on ascent. i would estimate the altitude of the other crafts to have been around 35,000 ft. they also had a silver reflective look to them.
content.summary: Ufo flies in low then ascends to other crafts

content.detailedDescription: Awakened as usual by my dogs @ around 3:05 am i took them to a field 75 yards east of my apt.I let 1 off leash and tethered other on 30' rope. i looked up and there it was pinkish in color what looked like two jellyfish facing away from each other but connected by rigid tentacles , the rounded spear shaped ends had flowing lights with a constant hue in between ( tentacle part) remember im comparing to two jellyfish, the outer shapes. it sat there like there was a slight distortion between it and i like gas fumes but still very clear visually. it was very large, my guess if it were to be laid in a  football field it would cover width and length. i know someone else must of seen this, after watching it for almost a minute i felt my female dog shaking against the back of my legs, scared, i had also let go of the rope that had my male dog sometime during the event, i looked around to see if i could spot him when all my hairs seemed to fill with a static electricity, the craft then shot off towards the southeast in a downward angle , still searching for it i saw what was the opposite  of a falling star shoot up into the sky with a tail of light behind it, miles to the south of me. i did find my male dog back on my porch, im talking about a dog that would live in that field rather than indoors if he could, he was also shaken up badly. both dogs acted very skitish for many hours following, i feel that was the most beatiful thing ive ever seen or could ever see in my lifetime. i would like one of your investigators to contact me, this was not my imagination or a lie or the first experience  ive had of this nature. its appreciated  that someone finally has the brains to look into these events, thank you. im submitting this to you via ps3 i cannot attach my sketch.
content.summary: Two jellyfish connected by rigid tentacles with flowing lights facing opposite  direction

content.detailedDescription: I was laying out on the back slab of the house on a lounger looking upward.  i watched a jet airliner fly over on it's way to cleveland.  we are about 60 miles from hopkins airport so the jets are pretty high here. as the jet passed over head it flew past a ufo shaped like a "cheerio".  the jet flew unward toward cleveland but the ufo remained motionless.  it appeared that the jet flew under the ufo and the ufo was about the size of a wing.  i went into the house to get my binoculars but when i got back the ufo was gone.
content.summary: I  saw a doughnut shaped ufo floating overhead a couple years ago in the early fall.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my sister were walking home. we turned around and witnessed a circular object in the sky with pulsing lights. my sister immediatly told me to run so we did. i only had eye contact with the object for a few seconds before we both ran to our house which was maybe 150ft away from where we were at the moment. i only recall feeling scared and confused. i never looked back to see if the object was still there so what it did next i can't say.
content.summary: Fuzzy rememberance of the event. was a child. all i did was run.
